bs-pagetemplates-desc: Displays a list of templates marked as page templates
bs-pagetemplates-tpl-desc-toolong: The description is too long. Please use a maximum length of 255 characters.
bs-pagetemplates-tpl-label-toolong: The label is too long. Please use a maximum length of 255 characters.
bs-pagetemplates-tpl-name-toolong: The template name is too long. Please use a maximum length of 255 characters.
bs-pagetemplates-no-id: Please enter a page to be used as template.
bs-pagetemplates-nooldtpl: The old template could not be found.
bs-pagetemplates-choose-template:
This page doesn't exist yet. You can create a new page. If you don't want to do that, click the back button of your browser to return to the last page visited. 

You can choose {{PLURAL:$1||one of}} the following {{PLURAL:$1|template|templates}}:
bs-pagetemplates-pref-excludens: Do not show templates in these namespaces:
bs-pagetemplates-pref-hideifnotintargetn: Hide template if the page is not to be created in the target namespace
bs-pagetemplates-confirm-deletetpl: Are you sure you want to delete {{PLURAL:$1|this template|these templates}}?
bs-pagetemplates-remove-message-unknown: An unexpected error occurred, please try again.
bs-pagetemplates-remove-message-failure: The following {{PLURAL:$1|template|templates}} could not be deleted: $2 (Reason: $3)
